translations: n.[木]裂缝；裂痕（rift 的复数）
v.[地质]断裂；分开（rift 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: There are possible rifts, even over the Big Society.
sentences.translation: 很多地方都可能有缺陷漏洞，甚至整个“大社会”的构想都会有一些问题。

sentences.sentence: Afghanistan has exposed two big rifts among the Allies.
sentences.translation: 阿富汗暴露了北约盟友间的两大矛盾。

sentences.sentence: He argued that it is the job of citizens to heal rifts and build partnerships.
sentences.translation: 麦克姆雷指出，公民的职责是消除人与人之间的裂缝，建立合作关系。
